dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database
program. Classified as a NoSQL database program, MongoDB uses JSON-like
documents with optional schemas.
dependent_to.name: mongodb

dependent_to.description: A robust email address syntax and deliverability validation library.
dependent_to.name: py-email-validator

dependent_to.description: Check for broken links in web sites.
dependent_to.name: py-linkchecker

dependent_to.description:
pyIsEmail is a no-nonsense approach for checking whether that user-
supplied email address could be real.
dependent_to.name: py-pyisemail

dependent_to.description:
The PyMongo distribution contains tools for interacting with MongoDB
database from Python. The bson package is an implementation of the BSON
format for Python. The pymongo package is a native Python driver for
MongoDB. The gridfs package is a gridfs implementation on top of
pymongo.
dependent_to.name: py-pymongo

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
